articles.title: Switch 2 tops 3.5 million sales to deliver Nintendo's biggest console launch
articles.description: The successor to Nintendo's massively popular console appears to have bolted out of the gate.
articles.content:
The Nintendo Switch 2 has sold over 3.5 million inits worldwide in four days.
The news comes straight from Nintendo, which explained the milestone marks the "highest global sales level for any Nintendo hardware" within that launch window.
The Switch ... [1282 chars]

articles.description: A new $400-million (over ₱22-billion) loan to be greenlit by the Manila-based Asian Development Bank (ADB) for the Philippines aims to enhance its host...
articles.content:
A new $400-million (over ₱22-billion) loan to be greenlit by the Manila-based Asian Development Bank (ADB) for the Philippines aims to enhance its host country's business environment through technology.

articles.title: Aurangzeb stresses tariff reforms key to export-led economy
articles.description: Some reporters initially boycott post-budget press conference over not being briefed on legislation for proposed budget.
articles.content:
Finance Minister Muhammad Aurangzeb on Wednesday stressed that planned tariff reforms that would reduce import duties were the key to an export-led economy in Pakistan.
He made the remarks during a post-budget press conference where he expanded upon ... [9750 chars]

articles.title: Elon Musk flips on attacks against Donald Trump: From mudslinging to ‘regretting’
articles.description: Days after bowing out of his role as one of Donald Trump's closest advisors, Elon Musk hammered the tax cuts and spending mega-bill as a ‘disgusting abomination,’ marking the beginning of a week-long feud between the two
articles.content: After nearly a week of mudslinging and online sparring, Elon Musk has backtracked on his attacks against Donald Trump, softening his stance on the United States president, hinting at a possible truce and reconciliation between the two. In a post on X... [5022 chars]

articles.title: SMRT files police report over social media video taken from MRT tracks
articles.description: SMRT said it takes a serious view of the incident as track trespassing poses severe safety risks. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:

articles.title: Second night of rioting in Ballymena leaves 17 police officers injured
articles.description: Racially motivated attacks have left families in fear, say police, after unrest broke out over alleged sexual assault
articles.content:
A second night of rioting has left 17 police officers injured and caused damage to several homes, businesses and vehicles in Ballymena in Northern Ireland.
A crowd launched a “sustained attack” on officers on Tuesday night by hurling petrol bombs, ma... [3510 chars]

articles.title: Businessman who accused Rep. Duterte of physical assault faces human trafficking raps
articles.description: The Davao City Regional Trial Court Branch 53 is set to arraign a businessman who earlier accused Rep. Paolo Duterte of physical assault and grave threat next...
articles.content:
The Davao City Regional Trial Court Branch 53 is set to arraign a businessman who earlier accused Rep. Paolo Duterte of physical assault and grave threat next month after formal charges of expanded anti-trafficking in persons were filed against him.

articles.description: Google announces Android 16 update with Material 3 Expressive design, forced notification grouping, live updates, and advanced security features.
articles.content:
Google announced the rollout of its Android 16 version, with the update first coming to supported Pixel devices before coming to other phone brands later in the year.
